name: Video Shoot
description: I provide video service for your business, I can take your business to the next level. I'm expert at wedding video shot. Each video is unique and I can make it your own.

name: Photo Retouching
description: I'm a professional Photoshop Editing and design expert. I'll fulfill your all Photoshop & Photo Editing, retouching, correcting, background removing, image editing needs.

name: Video Editing
description: I provide video editing service. After each video shoot I can edit your video to make it perfect for your business. I can make your video look perfect and professional.

name: Gadget Renting
description: I provide gadget renting service. I rent some of the best gadgets for your business. You can rent any gadget you want. Such as: camera, projector, printer, etc.
